about_the_game:
Decode alien recipes and cook peculiar dishes while solving puzzles and working as a team to become the greatest fast-food service in the universe!
Embark on an intergalactic culinary adventure in the kitchens of the Faraway Orbital Order & Delivery Services franchise in a cooperative game for up to 4 players that combines culinary mastery with communication puzzles in a chaotic kitchen-ship! Get ready for laughter, chaos, and unusual alien dishes as you and your novice chefs venture into the unknown.

MOUTH-WATERING PUZZLES
Decode codes, negotiate with alien rodents for cheese, win a fruity quiz, and solve many other wacky puzzles that require coordination and effective communication with your team. Be prepared for surprises around every corner!

A DASH OF FRIENDSHIP
Join friends in online matches and work together to decipher, prepare, and deliver challenging alien dishes. Efficient communication is the recipe for success! F.O.O.D.S. is the perfect game for players of all levels, with fun puzzles and a casual approach that allows everyone to have fun, regardless of their kitchen experience.

EXTRATERRESTRIAL LAUGHTER
Immerse yourself in a narrative filled with humor that takes you to bizarre alien galaxies. Captivating characters and absurd situations ensure an unforgettable journey.

F.O.O.D.S. offers a unique experience of cooperation and fun, where communication is the recipe for success. Get ready to create dishes that defy logic and laugh together as you embark on an intergalactic culinary adventure. Play with friends and family and enjoy hours of chaotic fun in the space kitchen of the famous franchise!

name: F.O.O.D.S.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bits
  • Processor: 7th generation i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Decode alien recipes and cook peculiar dishes while solving puzzles and work as a team to become the greatest fast-food service in the universe!
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
